step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your elbows a bit closer together in the next repetition.
You're doing well raising your hands. Focus on keeping your elbows closer to your head as you bring your hands up.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. This is a key part of the stretch.
You held the position well. Ensure your head stays upright and you're not pulling forward.
Great job reversing the motion. Try to maintain the elbow position as you return to the start.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close when raising your hands and spread them wide behind your head. This helps improve shoulder flexibility.
